events.message: The customer filed a new claim reporting a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the customerâ€™s initial report and vehicle details.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to ensure the customer receives consistent support throughout the process.
The customer was sent an official acknowledgment of their auto accident claim and next steps information.
The claims team requested accident photographs, police report, and vehicle registration documents to proceed.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photos of the damaged car.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and assessing the details of the collision.
Investigation completed confirming the liability of the other party involved in the vehicle accident.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the repair costs and damages.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the quick resolution and clear communication during the claim process.
The insurance company approved the claim as per the investigation and settlement terms agreed upon.
The approved payment was issued to the customer's designated bank account for vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the customer received payment and their repairs were underway.
